content: have too many plastic bags flopping around call upon this noble opossum to aid you your new friend will contain them in its stretchy belly and dispense them though its mouth reduce reuse regurgitate you will need worsted weight yarn in light gray dark gray white pink and beige 12mm safety eyes **notes** **this is a free pattern i if you find this pattern for sale on etsy or elsewhere it has been stolen ** check the number of rounds for each step skipping any rounds in the main body may lead to the head being misaligned at the end on **color changes** since this seems to have caused confusion when the instructions say for example *sc12 in gray single_crochet switching to white * what i mean is single_crochet 12 in gray then start the next single_crochet by pulling up a loop in gray then pull up white to pull though both loops and finish the stitch then continue on in white if you would rather do color changes some other way then just single_crochet 13 in grey then switch to white however you do it
